PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2003-11722003-08-12,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of ROBERT J. PERRY of Regina, Saskatchewan, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Robert Thomas Ross, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
